original_text: Paul said to him, ‘God will certainly hit you! You are a hypocrite! You are sitting there and you are judging me. You are asking if I obey the Law of God. But you yourself do not obey the Law! You should not have said, “Hit that man!” ’
korean_text: 바울이 이르되 회칠한 담이여 하나님이 너를 치시리로다 네가 나를 율법대로 심판한다고 앉아서 율법을 어기고 나를 치라 하느냐 하니

sentences.original_text: You are asking if I obey the Law of God
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 하나님의 율법을 순종하는지 묻고 있구나

sentences.original_text: But you yourself do not obey the Law
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너 자신은 율법을 순종하지 않는도다
